Peregrine falcon is the fastest animal i: What is the fastest animal in the world? Peregrine falcon speed compared to other animals
1. Cheetah. The African cheetah (Acinonyx jubatus) holds the title of the fastest animal and land mammal on Earth. They have been proven to reach a maximum speed of 104.2 km/h (64.8 mph).
What is the fastest animal in the world? Peregrine falcon speed compared to other animals

Fastest organism. The peregrine falcon is the fastest bird, and the fastest member of the animal kingdom, with a diving speed of over 300 km/h (190 mph). The fastest land animal is the cheetah. Among the fastest animals in the sea is the black marlin, with uncertain and conflicting reports of recorded speeds.
